update.code: "let multidb=new(require(\"../../system/multidb.js\"));exports.run={usage:[\"restart\"],category:\"owner\",async:async(e,{func:a,mecha:t})=>{await t.sendMessage(e.chat,{text:a.texted(\"monospace\",\"Restarting...\")},{quoted:e,ephemeralExpiration:e.expiration}).then(async()=>{if(await multidb.init.save(global.db),!process.send)return e.reply(\"Tidak dapat me-restart bot karena file `index.js` tidak dijalankan.\");process.send(\"reset\")})},devs:!0};"
